reference.title: Controller Database Configuration for the Application Server Data Source

section.p: The resources-extension.xml file located in <install_pack_dir>/domains/app_domain/installer contains the configuration settings for setting up the data source for the VMware service controller database in the application server. The values you specify in this file must match the corresponding entries in the <install_pack_dir>/databases/controller_db/db.properties file.
This appendix only describes the properties contained in the resources-extension.xml file that you can change. The other properties must not be changed.

section.title: ServerName
section.p: The name of the host the VMware service controller database is running on.

section.title: User
section.p: The name of the user to connect to the database.

section.title: Password
section.p: The password of the user to connect to the database.
